zh: 感谢大家关注UPK，我们会努力完善游戏！
一起期待UPK带来更多精彩冒险！
在UPK的世界里，神秘的遗迹隐藏着不为人知的秘密，探索时可要小心！
主角在旅途中会遇到强大的敌人，合理运用战斗系统的策略才能取胜。
游戏中的解谜元素和剧情紧密相连，解开谜题或许能揭开背后的真相。
某些角色的对话中藏着关键线索，仔细聆听或许能发现新的剧情走向。
不同的选择会影响剧情发展，试试用和平的方式解决冲突，看看会有什么不同。
UPK的音乐是一大特色，配合剧情营造出了独特的氛围，别忘了好好感受。
后续更新会拓展更多的地图区域，那里会有全新的挑战和惊喜。
en: Thank you for paying attention to UPK. We will strive to improve the game!
Let's look forward to more exciting adventures brought by UPK!
In the world of UPK, the mysterious ruins hide unknown secrets. Be careful when exploring!
The protagonist will encounter powerful enemies on the journey. Only by reasonably using the strategies of the combat system can you win.
The puzzle elements in the game are closely connected with the plot. Solving the puzzles may reveal the truth behind it.
There are key clues hidden in the dialogues of some characters. Listening carefully may lead to new plot developments.
Different choices will affect the plot development. Try to solve conflicts in a peaceful way and see what's different.
The music in UPK is a major feature, creating a unique atmosphere that matches the plot. Don't forget to enjoy it.
Subsequent updates will expand more map areas, where there will be new challenges and surprises.
